title: Smart Player 1.1.0 – Play and manage MP4 MKV AVI etc.
content: Smart Player makes watching videos on your Mac effortless! It plays all common file types (MOV, MP4, MKV, AVI plus many more) with ease. As you add video files to your Mac, Smart Player automatically adds them to its library. The app recognises movies, TV shows and home videos, and groups them for you.   […]

title: iStat Menus 6.62 – Monitor your system right from the menubar

title: Deflection 6.0.0 – Structural beam analysis
